text: Poecilus chalcites is a species of woodland ground beetle in the family Carabidae. It is found in the Caribbean, Central America, and North America. Poecilus chalcites, Pryor, OK, USA ==References== {{}https://bugguide.net/node/view/43888/bgimage ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Harpalinae Category:Beetles described in 1823
title: Poecilus chalcites
